Getting ready to start a new game of Dungeon World with my group. And I&#39;m taking the Paladin class going along the lines of Tank with heals. Anyone know of any good compendium classes out there that can expand on healing abilities? 
<div id='comment z134z5n5rmqptfywy04cedkygwiojpxrzb4'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/118088719859349999400_photo.jpg'> Mark Tygart</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-04-18 09:28:14 (edited: 2018-04-18 09:28:14)</cite></p>
        <p>&gt;The Chirurgeon: A possibly unstable surgeon that grimly stiches their companions back together.<br /><br /><a href="http://drivethrurpg.com/product/161538/Dungeon-World-Playbooks-Heroes-of-Steam-Bundle" class="ot-anchor">http://drivethrurpg.com/product/161538/Dungeon-World-Playbooks-Heroes-of-Steam-Bundle</a><br /><br />&gt;The Medic is a playbook for the Dungeon World roleplaying game. She is a healer who ensures the party survives the most dangerous of circumstances. <br /><br /><a href="http://drivethrurpg.com/product/113692/The-Medic--A-Dungeon-World-Playbook" data-embed="" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">http://drivethrurpg.com/product/113692/The-Medic--A-Dungeon-World-Playbook</a></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z134z5n5rmqptfywy04cedkygwiojpxrzb4'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/100476170927206311405_photo.jpg'> Damian “LFGM” Jankowski</h4>

        <p>The medic is an amazing playbook.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z134z5n5rmqptfywy04cedkygwiojpxrzb4'>

</div>
